FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
FAQ.description: Find answers to the most common questions here.
FAQ.section_description: Everything you need to know before you start.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, anytime from your account. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

why_pay.question: Why pay for crypto tracking?
why_pay.answer: To track your real performance, without Excel or approximations. We handle the complexity of calculations (Avg Price, unrealized/realized P&L) for you.

security.question: Is my data safe?
security.answer: Yes. CryptObs is private and does not connect to your wallets (no Read/Write API). You enter your transactions, we calculate. Your data remains yours.

annual.question: Can I pay annually?
annual.answer: Yes, at a reduced rate (-15%). You can choose this option directly during registration via the Monthly/Annual switch.

crypto_payment.question: Is crypto payment available?
crypto_payment.answer: Soon, in USDC (annual). We are working on integrating native crypto payments very shortly.

delete_account.question: How do I delete my account?
delete_account.answer: You can perform a full data deletion by going to Settings / Account Information in the "Danger Zone" section.
